If you don't plan to use your computer only as a typewriter you need at least Core i5 or Ryzen R3. Servo engine is also extremely slow and shitty coded thing. Rust and Servo are mistakes.

I think any slowness would have less to do with Rust being used and more to do with the fact that it's newer than something like Chromium.
